summary: Skeletons now have a chance to wear Iron Helmets.
descriptionHtml:
While modding, I discovered another unused feature in the game files that isn\'t actually implemented in the game. Did you know that skeletons can wear Iron Helmets? I didn\'t either, because they don\'t in the game.

With this mod, I\'ve reincorporated this feature so that melee skeletons have a 25% chance to spawn with helmets. This works using outfits - no new models or actors are added, so this mod should not conflict with Skyrim Monster Mod or any other mod that adds new creatures to the skeleton level lists.

Have fun!
author: Captain Lhurgoyf
